text:
Consulted with Dr. Jordan on two separate occasions for different health concerns, and I can confidently say that his care and expertise are exceptional. Even though the consultations were virtual, his approach was incredibly thorough and professional. He took the time to ask detailed, thoughtful questions to fully understand my symptoms and provided insightful recommendations that put my mind at ease. I felt heard, valued, and well taken care of throughout the consultations. Strongly recommend him for anyone seeking a knowledgeable, responsible, and
compassionate doctor.

I had a great experience with Dr. Jordan. His diagnosis was spot on, and he took the time to explain everything in detail, making me feel reassured and well cared for.

The prompt delivery of medicines made the entire process smooth and hassle-free. His professionalism, kindness, and efficiency truly set his teleconsult apart.

Highly recommend for anyone looking for a reliable and caring GP!

I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude and appreciation to Dr. Jordan for his exceptional kindness in attending to my both children. From the registration to the end of the consultation, the entire process was incredibly smooth and efficient, which is reduced lot of waiting time in queue.

He went above and beyond by sharing additional information and advice with us, which was extremely helpful. His patience and thorough explanations made us feel confidence and well-informed.

I am truly thankful for his dedication and compassion. I highly recommend Dr. Jordan to anyone in need of excellent medical care.
Dr Jordan is very professional and sharp in diagnosing the patient illness. Telconsult also clear and precise. Highly recommended. üëç

Highly recommended! Swift and prompt service provided by Lin! Dr Jordan was warm and kind towards my little daughter, made her feel comfortable during the telecommunication. The whole session ended very fast and fuss-free, no need to wait for long queues at the doctor‚Äôs office anymore.
